TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to click on 'General Tab'.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'General Tab'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'General Tab'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'General Tab'.

TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to click 'Casualty Severity by Year'.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click 'Casualty Severity by Year' from the report list.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Casualty Severity by Year'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Casualty Severity by Year'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Casualty Severity by Year'.

TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to run 'Casualty Severity by Year'.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Run 'Casualty Severity by Year' from the report list.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to run 'Casualty Severity by Year'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to run 'Casualty Severity by Year'.
